content: Singaporean private equity fund management firm **Northstar Group** is a Singapore-based [private equity](/wiki/Private_equity) fund management firm dedicated to investments in growth companies in [Indonesia](/wiki/Indonesia) and other countries in Southeast Asia. The firm is partly owned by [TPG Capital](/wiki/TPG_Capital). Northstar's investments include [Gojek](/wiki/Gojek) and [Indomaret](/wiki/Indomaret). - Official website This [Singaporean corporation or company](/wiki/List_of_companies_of_Singapore) article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Northstar Group
